poweredUpHubs.title: Powered Up Hubs
poweredUpHubs.message: The official firmware can be restored on Powered Up hubs by putting the hub in bootloader mode and connecting to the hub using one of the official LEGO apps.

spikeHubs.title: SPIKE/MINDSTORMS Hubs
spikeHubs.message: The official LEGO software for these hubs does not have a way to restore the firmware on these hubs. So, we have provided a special site to do this for you.
